body:
Comment 2: 
Cannot reproduce on Snow Leopard.
I think this was fixed by revision 4187,
which changed the out of bounds action
from a breakpoint to an "index out of range".

I can't explain why the breakpoint produces SIGSEGV.

Please try "hg pull -u", re-run all.bash, and build again.
_Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **Fixed**._
